divs: Sighting DetailsI have lived in Winnie most of my life. I have seen on several occasions unusual lights off Hwy 73. I have always attributed them to planes or helicopters due to the Strategic Petroleum Reserve located in the area. Now I am questioning that since I read the person's account on Feb. 16th this year. My son also called me at work one night because something the size of a 727 flew and hovered very low over our home. There were no lights, and he was 20 years old, and frightened enough to ask me to come home. I thought he had been watching too much TV? He is an Army Reservist, and has since been to Iraq, with less fear than what he says he experienced that night.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Winnie
There were no other sightings in Winnie on or around March 25th 2009
